title: Can not create new wallet by geth command line, error is out of memory
body:
Hi there, i downloaded geth and try to create a new account by command line, then error occur.

#### System information

Geth version: `1.9.9`
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash : download from geth.ethereum.org

#### Expected behaviour
create new wallet, print wallet address in console


#### Actual behaviour
fatal error: runtime: out of memory

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
./geth account new
then input the password

#### Backtrace


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3174573/70494351-f5473780-1b45-11ea-8dd5-c1aef2e6701c.png)
Looks like i have 800M RAM in my computer, 1 CPU 2.0GHz
You might want to use `--lightkdf` with so little memory
@ligi Now it works for me, thanks!
